locals.title: Chai
locals.description: Chai is a BDD / TDD assertion library for [node](http://nodejs.org) and the browser that can be delightfully paired with any javascript testing framework.

expect.title: expect / should [bdd]
expect.description: The BDD style allows you to write your assertions in a natural, self-describing manner.

assert.title: assert [tdd]
assert.description: The TDD style allows you to write your assertions using the classic 'assert dot' notation.
